programme.title: Live UEFA Champions League
programme.desc: Paris Saint-Germain v Inter Milan (Kick-off 8.00pm). Coverage of the final from Allianz Arena in Munich, Germany. Paris Saint-Germain beat Arsenal 3-1 on aggregate to make their first Champions League final since 2020, while Inter reached this stage after two epic semi-final ties against Barcelona. The Italian club drew 3-3 in the first leg before winning 4-3 in the second to win 7-6 overall, with Davide Frattesi scoring the winner in extra time
